Authors:
Luis E Eguiarte, E. D. Luna, Alfonso Delgado-Salinas, Juan
Carlos Montero-Castro
Title:
Phylogenetic analysis of Cestrum section Habrothamnus
(Solanaceae) based on plastid and nuclear DNA sequences
Abstract:
Phylogenetic analysis from chloroplast regions and nuclear
ribosomal ITS sequences was conducted to test the monophyly of sect.
Habrothamnus and investigate its relationships with other sections of
Cestrum. Molecular divergence was very low among the sampled species,
suggesting a rapid diversification in Cestrum. Individual and combined
analyses of these molecular data sets using maximum parsimony and
Bayesian inference reject the monophyly of the traditionally recognized
sections of Cestrum, including sect. Habrothamnus. Infrageneric
classifications will require significant revision. Nevertheless, the
resolved monophyletic clades in this molecular analysis are
geographically structured.
